scripts.___: putting stuff in here means you can run it from anywhere in the repo :)
scripts.format: ftool format && clang-format -i `git ls-files '*.ino'` `git ls-files '?*.h*'` `git ls-files '*.cpp'`
scripts.__: You can pass extra args in by doing 'yarn make -- <args>' - Actually, I don't think this works with the follow-on fixcc
scripts.laptype: cd src && make laptype && yarn fixcc
scripts.lt: cd src && make laptype && yarn fixcc
scripts.ltf: cd src && make laptypef && yarn fixcc
scripts.threepiece: cd src && make threepiece && yarn fixcc
scripts.3pf: cd src && make threepiecef && yarn fixcc
scripts.f3p: cd src && make threepiecef && yarn fixcc
scripts.3p: cd src && make threepiece && yarn fixcc
scripts.calc: cd src && make calc && yarn fixcc
scripts.mock: cd src && make mock && yarn fixcc
scripts.img: cd src && make img && yarn fixcc
scripts.test: cd src && make test && yarn fixcc
scripts.sd: cd src && make sd && yarn fixcc
scripts.sdf: cd src && make sdf && yarn fixcc
scripts.cmake: rimraf build && cmake -S src -B build -G Ninja -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=tools/toolchains/Teensy40.cmake
